name: Marduk
blurb: This would be a more detailed description of the company, for example: Founded in 2016, 4iQ’s investigation platform is a defence grade integrated response system in the  field of data mining, capable of configuring threat alerts and visualising trends for better intelligence. It blends the web intelligence it gathers with an organisation’s internal data to create a comprehensive picture across the entire security intelligence cycle. It is prviding cyber risk intelligence for both the public sector and private sector. Defence departments, law enforcement agencies, physical and managed security service providers and infrastructure companies are listed as reference csutomers on the company’s web site, and include intelligence units in Spain, such as Guardia Civil. It’s prvate sector clients include IT and telecoms companies, infrastructure and energy, banking, legal, security services and media.
